Scenic Circle Airedale Hotel\'s Auckland accommodation is centrally situated on the corner of Queen and Airedale Streets. As a guest, you’ll appreciate the superb inner-city location, that provides you with affordable Auckland hotel accommodation with some the city\'s best attractions, entertainment and restaurants at your doorstep.This well-loved and historic landmark, formerly known as the MLC Building, has been completely refurbished and transformed into the stylish 3-star plus Scenic Circle Airedale Hotel. Constructed in 1954, it was Auckland’s first high-rise office building. The building is now protected by the Historic Places Trust, and as such, every attention was given to the lavish restoration of this unique landmark. The art deco charm of the 1950’s is reflected throughout the hotel’s architecture with beautifully presented areas such as the entrance foyer. The guest rooms have a modern apartment style, yet carry the art deco theme through in the finer details such as the eye-catching black and white artworks that complement each room.

Ideally situated in the centre of Auckland, near all the shops and many of the tourist attractions, a two minute walk from the Sky City complex and Sky Tower. Superior Room X1 King Bed or X2 Queen Beds, can accommodate a maximum of 3 adults or 2 adults and 2 children sharing existing bedding only. Aria Restaurant and Bar - breakfast features an extensive buffet which includes eggs cooked to guests liking, a fresh fruit juicer and fresh hot coffee. Lunch includes both an a la carte menu and a working lunch buffet with a range of hot and cold dishes. Dinner will inspire and Aria has been recognised for producing the best beef and lamb dishes in New Zealand. Coupled with an extensive a la carte menu highlighting seasonal, fresh produce served in a contemporary environment, Aria is the perfect dining experience. Aria Bar is perfect for a pre dinner drink before embarking on Auckland?s entertainment hubs, after work social drinks, cocktail parties, small business meetings or just to relax in comfort and enjoy a great coffee. A range of local and imported beer, New Zealand wines and traditional or feature cocktails are available along with a Bar Bites menu. The bar is open from 7am until late. Alternatively, located in the heart of Auckland City, the Atrium on Elliott foodcourt with a fantastic range of international cusine can be accessed from Albert St via Crowne Plaza Auckland. Also located on Elliott St, only steps away from the hotel, Elliott Stables offers a unique dining experience with the philosophy ?Come in and sit anywhere A modern high rise building. A medium size Lobby. There is also a walkway through to the Atrium on Elliot shopping precint on the lower levels. Crowne Plaza Auckland is located in the very heart of the "City of Sails" and is the first choice for holiday makers,  leisure travellers and locals alike. The hotel is superbly positioned in the entertainment and shopping hub of Auckland city. It is only a short stroll to Queen Street, Aotea Convention Centre, Sky Tower, the Viaduct Basin and Wynyard Quarter. Due to its unique design, the rooms start from the 16th floor, ensuring many guest rooms provide excellent views over downtown Auckland. The hotels boasts a top floor Club lounge with maginificent views over Auckland. All Club rooms enjoy exclusive access to the 28th floor Club lounge and guests enjoy continental breakfast and evening cocktials served daily in the lounge. WiFi is available for a surcharge of $25/24 hours payable direct. CA1014
